author: kpedro88
body: @pdudero noticed that HcalUpgradeDataFrame and QIE11DataFrame had different ADC distributions. This turns out to be a bug that has been around for ~4 years: the HPD ion feedback simulation was still being applied for the HcalUpgradeDataFrames because they used the same amplifier object as the HBHE QIE8 data frames. This PR fixes the problem.
title: separate amplifier for HcalUpgradeDataFrames
